name: Law Enforcement Assistance National Crime Information Center
objective: The FBI National Crime Information Center (NCIC) is designed to complement the development of similar metropolitan and statewide criminal justice information systems and provide a computerized central index to documented files of local and State criminal justice agencies.
applicant_types: State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)
categories: Law, Justice, and Legal Services - Law Enforcement Support

pons.pon: Improve Investigatory Capacity of Criminal Activity
